CustomField.description: Check this box to disable the validation rule that checks for special characters in the Project Code External_Id_it__c field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This checkbox controls whether the 'External ID No Special Characters' validation rule fires on the Project Code External_Id_it__c field. When checked, the system will not enforce the rule that prevents special characters from being added.
CustomField.label: Disable ProjectCode ExtId Validation
